overview: Elise Kroll is Vice President of Business Development for DAVID Corporation and is responsible for forming partner relationships and revenue generation through channel networks. With over 20 years in the insurance industry, heading up a TPA for Property & Casualty claims, and later becoming a broker for Life, Accident & Health Insurance, Elise has worked with domestic and global companies to align business requirements with technical solutions. Through her work in the TPA market, Elise leveraged technology and business partner relationships and pioneered a new paradigm for online collaborative claims processing. Elise received her BA and MA in Russian Literature from the University of California, Los Angeles.
